DOC.brief_summary: A Multi-Centre , Open , Non-controlled , Clinical Investigation Evaluate User Friendliness Wear Time Multi-layer Foam Dressings With Safetac® Pressure Injury Prevention Intensive Care Unit
DOC.brief_title: Pressure Injury Prevention ICU With Multi-Layer Foam Dressings
DOC.criteria: Patient risk develop pressure injury heel and/or sacrum Aged ≥ 18 year Patient his/her legal representative able understand voluntarily sign informed consent Estimated treatment period ICU patient least 46 day Patient pressure injury blister sacrum and/or heel Patient know suspected sensitivity component product evaluate Patient include clinical investigation present within last 30 day
